item.title: [prm] Enter the Infinite
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

item.title: [a22] Brittle Blast
item.description:
Instant

Creatures and planeswalkers your opponents control perpetually gain "If this permanent would die, exile it instead." Brittle Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467822630438940680

item.title: [a22] Conductive Current
item.description:
Sorcery

Conductive Current deals 3 damage to each creature. Choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains "If this spell would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467834600374292489

item.title: [a22] Bloodrage Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

When Bloodrage Alpha enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Another target Wolf or Werewolf you control fights target creature you don't control.

• When you cast your next Wolf or Werewolf spell, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467816860829859840

item.title: [a22] Arms Scavenger
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Arms Scavenger's spellbook, then exile it. Until the end of turn, you may play that card.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467804327649624064

item.title: [a22] Electrostatic Blast
item.description:
Instant

Electrostatic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467857568592769029

item.title: [a22] Frenzied Geistblaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess

When Frenzied Geistblaster enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more instant and/or sorcery cards among cards in your graveyard, hand, and library, you may discard a card. If you do, seek an instant or sorcery card.

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467857740068491266

item.title: [a22] Fearsome Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

At the beginning of your end step, each Dragon card in your hand perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467866538623619072

item.title: [a22] Town-razer Tyrant
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Town-razer Tyrant enters the battlefield, target land you don't control loses all abilities except mana abilities and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 2 damage to you unless you sacrifice it."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467869860071882753

item.title: [a22] Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tibalt

+1: Add {R}{R}. Draft a card from Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter's spellbook, then exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

+1: Tibalt, Wicked Tormenter deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker unless its controller has Tibalt deal 3 damage to them. If they do, you may discard a card. If you do, draw card.

−X: Create X 1/1 red Devil creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1467881174664101891

item.title: [a22] Cursebound Witch
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

When Cursebound Witch dies, draft a card from Cursebound Witch's spellbook.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467952774449025024

item.title: [a22] Break Expectations
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals all cards with mana value 2 or greater in their hand. You choose a card from among those cards. Exile that card. If a card was exiled this way, that player drafts a card from Break Expectations's spellbook and reveals it.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467950100970291200

item.title: [a22] Veteran Ghoulcaller
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Menace

Whenever a card in your graveyard is put into your hand, conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467958259399073794

item.title: [a22] Sap Vitality
item.description:
Instant

Sap Vitality deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +3/+0.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467957155928035329

item.title: [a22] Sanguine Brushstroke
item.description:
Enchantment

When Sanguine Brushstroke enters the battlefield, create a Blood token and conjure a card named Blood Artist onto the battlefield.

Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467956565906886656

item.title: [a22] Citystalker Connoisseur
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Deathtouch

When Citystalker Connoisseur enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card with the greatest mana value among cards in their hand. Create a Blood token.

item.title: [a22] Assemble from Parts
item.description:
Instant

Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "{3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Shuffle it into your library. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."

https://twitter.com/numotthenummy/status/1467949008706748416

item.title: [a22] Puppet Raiser
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, seek a creature card with mana value equal to that mana value of that card plus one. That card perpetually gains menace.

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467956057515302915

item.title: [a22] Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, deathtouch

Whenever Gutmorn, Pactbound Servant enters the battlefield, each player discard a nonland card.

Whenever a player discards a card during your turn, they choose another player That player conjures a duplicate of that card into their hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1467953751164010497

item.title: [sld] Demonlord Belzenlok
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Demon

Flying, trample

When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

item.title: [sld] Razaketh, the Foulblooded
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Liliana's Contract
item.description:
Enchantment

When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

item.title: [sld] Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Griselbrand
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, lifelink

Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

item.title: [a22] Toralf's Disciple
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Haste

Whenever Toralf's Disciple's attacks, conjure four cards named Lightning Bolt into your library, then shuffle.

item.title: [a22] Patient Zero
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Lifelink

Damage isn't removed from creatures your opponents control during cleanup steps.

item.title: [a22] Ominous Traveler
item.description:
Creature — Human

When Ominous Traveler enters the battlefield, draft a card from Ominous Traveler's spellbook. That card perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell" and "When you cast this spell, return a card named Ominous Traveler you control to its owner's hand."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Gitrog, Horror of Zhava
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Frog Horror

Menace

At the beginning of each combat, if Gitrog, Horror of Zhava is untapped, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do, tap Gitrog, Horror of Zhava, then seek a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, it perpetually gains "{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Draw a card."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Geistchanneler
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Geistchanneler enters the battlefield, choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand with mana value 3 or greater. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} less to cast."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Forsaken Crossroads
item.description:
Land

Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped.

As Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, choose a color.

When Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, scry 1. If you weren't the starting player, you may untap Forsaken Crossroads instead.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Begin Anew
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. Creature cards in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Absorb Energy
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Cards in your hand that share a card type with that spell perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Ishkanah, Broodmother
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spider

Reach

Other spiders you control get +1/+2.

{1}{B/G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draft a card from Ishkanah, Broodmother's spellbook.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Captain Eberhart
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Double strike

Spell cast from amount cards you drew this turn cost {1} less to cast.

Spells cast from among cards your opponents drew this turn cost {1} more to cast.

item.description:
Creature — Angel Cleric

Flying, lifelink

Whenever Angel of Unity enters the battlefield or you cast a party spell, choose a party creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1. (A party card or spell is a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

item.title: [a22] Divine Purge
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile all artifacts and creatures with mana value 3 or less. They perpetually gain "This spell costs {2} more to cast" and "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped." For as long as each of them remain exiled, its owner may play it.

item.title: [a22] Expedition Supplier
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Expedition Supplier or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, conjure a card named Utility Knife onto the battlefield. This ability only triggers once each turn.

item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Clue

When Slayer's Bounty enters the battlefield, look at the creature cards in target opponent's hand.

Whenever you sacrifice Slayer's Bounty or another Clue, draft a card from Slayer's Bounty's spellbook.

{2}, Slayer's Bounty: Draw a card.

item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, conjur a card named Sigardian Evangel into your hand. Discard that card at the beginning of your next untap step.

When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, tap target permanent you don't control.

item.description:
Instant

Conjure a card named Suntail Squadron into your hand. if you have fewer than 7 cards in hand, repeat this process.

Creature — Spirit

Lifelink

Whenever Ethereal Escort enters the battlefield or attacks, choose a card in your hand. It perpetually gains lifelink.

item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Clone Crafter enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of a random creature card from your opponent's library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spell mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

item.title: [a22] Inquisitor Captain
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Vigilance

When Inquisitor Captain enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more creature cards with mana value 3 or less among cards in your graveyard, hand, or library, seek two creature cards with mana value 3 or less. Put one of them onto the battlefield and shuffle the other into your library.

item.title: [a22] Discover the Formula
item.description:
Instant

Seek three nonland cards, then nonland cards in your hand perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

item.title: [a22] Angel of Eternal Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of Eternal Dawn enters the battlefield, it becomes day.

It can't become night.

Your opponents can't cast spells with mana value greater than the number of turns they have begun.

item.title: [a22] Geist of Regret
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Geist of Regret enters the battlefield, put a random instant card from your library into your graveyard. Then put a random sorcery card from your library into your graveyard.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard, copy that spell. You may chose new targets for the copy.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466897042039525378

item.title: [a22] Kindred Denial
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Seek a card with the same mana value as that spell.

item.description:
Creature — Giant Wizard

Ward {1}

When Rimewall Protector enters the battlefield, each other Giant or Wizard you control and each Giant or Wizard card in your hand perpetually gains ward {1}.

item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Ward {2}

Whenever Obessive Collector deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of cards in your hand.
